cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.8)
project(lunar_nav)

if(CMAKE_COMPILER_IS_GNUCXX OR CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID MATCHES "Clang")
  add_compile_options(-Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic)
endif()

# Find dependencies
find_package(ament_cmake REQUIRED)
find_package(ament_cmake_python REQUIRED)
find_package(rosidl_default_generators REQUIRED)
find_package(std_msgs REQUIRED)
find_package(geometry_msgs REQUIRED)

# Python package (Manual install to avoid conflict with rosidl)
# ament_python_install_package(${PROJECT_NAME})

# Install python source (excluding __init__.py which is generated by rosidl)
install(DIRECTORY lunar_nav/
  DESTINATION local/lib/python3.10/dist-packages/lunar_nav
  PATTERN "__init__.py" EXCLUDE
)

# Install scripts
install(PROGRAMS
  scripts/crater_detector
  scripts/particle_filter
  scripts/teleop_keyboard
  scripts/navigator
  DESTINATION lib/${PROJECT_NAME}
)

# Generate messages
rosidl_generate_interfaces(${PROJECT_NAME}
  "msg/Crater.msg"
  "msg/CraterArray.msg"
  DEPENDENCIES std_msgs geometry_msgs
)

# Install launch files
install(DIRECTORY
  launch
  urdf
  worlds
  DESTINATION share/${PROJECT_NAME}/
)

ament_package()
